001package org.biopax.validator.api;
002
003import org.biopax.validator.api.beans.Validation;
004
005
006/**
007 * A validation rule.
008 *
009 * @param <T> a type of a model object or a data parser, stream, etc.
010 *
011 * @author rodche
012 */
013public interface Rule<T> {
014
015  /**
016   * Validates the object.
017   *
018   * @param validation the object where the model, validation settings and errors are stored
019   * @param thing      to validate
020   */
021  void check(Validation validation, T thing);
022
023  /**
024   * Can check it?
025   *
026   * @param thing an object to validate
027   * @return True when this rule can check the object.
028   */
029  boolean canCheck(Object thing);
030
031
032  /**
033   * Saves the error or warning that occurred or was fixed.
034   * Call this method from a validation rule implementation
035   * every time after a problem is found and/or fixed.
036   *
037   * @param validation the object where the model, validation settings and errors are stored
038   * @param object     that is invalid or caused the error
039   * @param code       error code, e.g., 'illegal.value'
040   * @param setFixed   true/false - whether the issue was auto-fixed or not
041   * @param args       extra parameters for the error message template
042   */
043  void error(Validation validation, Object object, String code, boolean setFixed, Object... args);
044
045}
